snippet: One golfer said he considered dropping to his knees to pray on the course, a la Tim Tebow, while others admitted they had imitated the quarterback's pose.
abstract: One golfer said he considered dropping to his knees to pray on the course, a la Tim Tebow, while others admitted they had imitated the quarterback's pose.
lead_paragraph: KAPALUA, Hawaii - Jonathan Byrd carries a Bible verse in his back pocket, in his yardage book, but would he ever consider a more conspicuous display of his faith after a round, like dropping on his knees and praying a la Denver Broncos quarterback Tim Tebow?

headline.main: At Tournament of Champions, Talk of Tebow and Tebowing
